entry.title: This Blog-like Thing is Coming Soon
entry.content: The Data Humanist (this blog-like thing that you are currently reading) is coming soon. My first post will be October 1, 2016, and I will follow with a once-a-month post thereafter for 12 months. At the end of this 12-month period, I will decide whether to continue publishing my work in this form or to do something new.

entry.title: About
entry.content:
This is a website that was made with the Lektor quickstart.

And it does not contain a lot of information.
